context: Multi-agent AI automation system for business operations
Farm 5.0 agent system with customer support, sales, finance, and analytics agents
Built with Python FastAPI backend and React TypeScript frontend
Uses OpenAI and Anthropic Claude APIs for AI capabilities
Implements Gmail API for email management
PostgreSQL database with structured agent workflows
notes: Agent system has built-in state management with AgentStatus enum
Action logging system with timestamps and approval workflows
Task scheduling with priority queues implemented
Agent lifecycle management through BaseAgent class
Comprehensive test suite with pytest and httpx
Dashboard components for monitoring agent activities
MCP integration completed - memory framework active
Connected to global MCP system for persistent memory management
current_status: Active development with full agent infrastructure
